samanthazoek: Every December I like to book a luxury lodge with a hot tub via Hoseasons. Because it's out of season you can stay for 3 nights for about £300 in a lodge that would cost £500+ in peak time. Location doesn't matter because the plan is to buy food on the way then stay in the lodge all weekend, eating, drinking, watching Netflix and relaxing in the tub. It's pure perfection ♥️
